app.description: Zoom is a secure and reliable video platform that supports all of your online communication needs. It can provide everything from one on one meetings, chat, phone, webinars, and large-scale online events. Available with both desktop, web, and mobile versions.

statusText.redirect_request_does_not_contain_app_id: Redirect request does not contain app ID
statusText.redirect_request_does_not_contain_author: Redirect request does not contain authorization code
statusText.error_getting_busy_times: Error getting busy times from Zoom: {error}
statusText.error_getting_meeting_url: Error getting meeting URL from Zoom: {error}

toast.request_error: There was a problem with your request.
